titleStmt.title: Country conversations being an account of some discourses that happen'd in a visit to the country last summer, on divers subjects : chiefly of the modern comedies, of drinking, of translated verse, of painting and painters, of poets and poetry.
titleStmt.author: Wright, James, 1643-1713.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Wright by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
